title: Engraved Silver Adoption Symbol Necklace 18-inch Length
description: This listing is for one 3/4-inch Adoption Triad Symbol Necklace. Whether purchasing this gift for a birth mom, adoptive mom, or adoptee they are sure to love it. It is simple but the message is deep. Adoption Triad is a triangle which symbolizes the three parties involved in an adoption: adoptee, adoptive parents and birth parents. The Triad or Triangle appears to: Demonstrate an equal distance or separation between the three members.The Adoption Triad symbol is expertly engraved on a 3/4" shiny stainless steel disc and hangs from an 18" durable Stainless Steel Cable chain with lobster clasp. It is small, sleek, lightweight, and yet it's heavy symbolism is deep in its message of selflessness; both from the birth mom and adoptive mom.Your necklace is perfectly packaged in a blue organza bag perfect for gift giving.
details: {"Package Dimensions": "7.2 x 4.76 x 0.79 inches; 0.53 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "August 13, 2017"}
